10 PRINT CHR$(147)
20 X=0:Y=0:C=0
30 IF C>320 THEN GOTO 600
35 READ X
40 READ Y
50 GOSUB 500
55 C=C+2
60 GOTO 30
500 POKE 1024+X+40*Y,160:RETURN
501 DATA 2,19,2,18,2,17,2,16,2,15
502 DATA 2,14,2,13,2,12,2,11
503 DATA 2,10,2,9,2,8,2,7
504 DATA 2,6,3,6,3,5,4,5
505 DATA 4,4,5,4,6,4,7,4
506 DATA 7,5,8,5,8,6,8,7
507 DATA 9,7,9,8,9,9,9,10
508 DATA 8,10,8,11,7,11,7,12
509 DATA 6,12,6,13,5,13,4,13
510 DATA 7,13,8,13,9,13,9,14
511 DATA 10,15,10,16,10,17,10,18
512 DATA 9,18,9,19,8,19,7,19
513 DATA 7,20,6,20,5,20,4,20
514 DATA 3,20,12,11,13,12,13,13
515 DATA 13,14,13,15,13,16,13,17
516 DATA 13,18,13,19,13,20,12,8
517 DATA 20,10,19,10,19,9,18,9
518 DATA 17,9,17,10,16,10,16,11
519 DATA 16,12,16,13,16,14,16,15
520 DATA 17,15,18,15,19,15,19,14
521 DATA 19,13,20,13,20,12,20,11
522 DATA 21,13,21,14,21,15,21,16
523 DATA 21,17,21,18,21,19,20,19
524 DATA 20,20,20,21,19,21,19,22
525 DATA 18,22,18,23,17,23,16,23
526 DATA 16,22,15,22,15,21,15,20
527 DATA 16,20,16,19,17,19,18,19
528 DATA 18,18,19,18,19,17,28,9
529 DATA 27,9,26,9,25,9,25,10
530 DATA 24,10,24,11,24,12,25,12
531 DATA 26,13,27,13,28,13,29,13
532 DATA 29,14,29,15,29,16,29,17
533 DATA 28,17,28,18,27,18,26,18
534 DATA 25,18,24,18,24,17,23,17
535 DATA 31,9,31,10,32,10,32,11
536 DATA 33,11,33,12,33,13,34,13
537 DATA 34,14,35,14,35,15,38,8
538 DATA 38,9,37,10,37,11,36,11
539 DATA 36,12,36,13,36,14,35,16
540 DATA 35,17,35,18,34,18,34,19
541 DATA 34,20,33,20,33,21,33,22
542 DATA 0,0,0,0,0
600 END
